text.front:
GUT INSTINCTS: MY PERSPECTIVE
Understanding Legal and Regulatory Adverse Actions:
How Trouble Could Come at You
Kayla A. Feld, JD 1 and Andrew D. Feld, MD, JD 2,3
Clinical and Translational Gastroenterology (2016) 7, e158;
doi:10.1038/ctg.2015.56
; published online 24 March 2016
